[bq="SquiggyBomb"][spoiler]Have you ever woken up and realized that you were super horny? Nothing like morning wood. I mean straight up "If I don't cum this morning I'm not gonna function properly for the rest of the day" kind of horny.[/spoiler][/bq]
Everyday I wake up, that isn't a work morning at least, I just writhe around grinding, humping, and rubbing at myself, and generally fantasizing

topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553b346a6368722a90f20a00#post_553b346a6368722a90f20a00
[bq="Thanotos Omega"]"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553b336c636872741dd80d00#post_553b336c636872741dd80d00

[spoiler]!http://fc05.deviantart.net/fs14/f/2007/091/2/b/FMA___Nina_Chimera_by_dazwolf.jpg! "big brother Squiggy why does it hurt"[/spoiler][/bq]
This is probably going to get me hate, but Tucker was a smart scientist *BUT* he had no regard for the rules of scientific study.  Where he went wrong was that he skipped from animal testing straight to human testing off the bat.

Bido, Martel, Roa, Dolcetto, Ulchi, Heinkel, Jerso, Zampano all had human forms.  Why did he lobotomize Nina?  Why did he not give her a human form?

topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553bec4e63687223535a0200#post_553bec4e63687223535a0200
But still; he had the knowledge into making chimeras.  The least he could have done is keep Nina's brain intact.  If he had just kept her brain as it was then he could have eventually given her a human looking body; sure the experience would traumatize Nina with her having to have mental help for years and she would essentially be only half human and not have kids, but holy hell did he fuck her up.

He essentially lobotomized her.  If he hadn't merged their brains then they could have repaired most of the damage.
